forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain with some snow mixing in for the afternoon. High near 5C. SSW winds shifting to ENE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain...mixing with snow for the afternoon. High near 40F. SSW winds shifting to ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow this evening turning to rain overnight. Low 2C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow this evening changing to rain late. Low around 35F. N winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 100%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 42F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 34F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 43F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 50F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 6C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 43F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 40F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 9C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.
